description:
Ever struggled to grab your water bottle on a rainy or hot day? The Gripper's textured top helps you get solid grip, no matter how heavy the downpour or sweaty your hands.

  • Unique textured surface offers improved grip
  • Soft, squeezable body
  • Insulated closed cell foil insert keeps your water cool
  • Silicone mouthpiece and high-flow valve won't leave you thirsty
  • BPA-free. Safe for fluids between 0 and 70°C
name: Cannondale Gripper Logo Insulated Water Bottle 650ml
